title: HVD SQ. - 2 -Floors & 1.5Baths ~ New Kitchen & Modern Baths
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 34316363', 'Rent: $3,400 / Month', 'Beds: 1', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 01/01/2023', 'Pet: No Pets', 'Rent Includes:: Heat, Hot Water', 'Parking:: street parking', 'HVD SQ. - 2 -Floors & 1.5Baths ~ Fully Furnished.', 'Great Space in Harvard ~ Harvard Main Campus a Block Away', '18 Century Historical Building ~ Living room has large bay windows, oak floors, oak paneling, 14 feet ceilings and a Working Fireplace.', 'The kitchen has new appliances (stainless steel refrigerator ,glass top stove),dishwasher, disposal, granite island dishwasher, and disposal.', 'Unit has nice oak floors, large windows and a Modern tiled bath.', 'The Bedroom is huge (300+ sf) with a walk in closet.', '(Bedroom is Garden / Basement Level)', 'Separate Private Egress from the Downstairs/Bedroom.', '2 Small Windows in the Downstairs/Bedroom.', 'Private 1/2 Bath Downstairs in Bedroom.', 'Electric for Bottom Downstairs is Provided Complimentary by the Landlord!!', 'Heat and hot water are included in the rent.', 'There is a bike storage in the building as well as a nice laundry room.', 'This building is Professionally managed and has security & elevator.', 'It is adjacent to the Harvard University & Hotel Veritas and steps to Harvard University, the T/Subway and lots of Restaurants & Nightlife.', 'Note: there is a one month broker fee.', 'FEATURES', 'Ceramic Tiles', 'Dining Room', 'Dishwasher', 'Fireplace', 'Hardwood Floors', 'High Ceiling', 'Laundry in Building', 'Microwave', 'Modern Bath', 'Modern Kitchen', 'New/Renovated Bath', 'Storage', 'Carlina Nabatoff', 'Text Friendly | 617-992-0978', 'The Abundant Group | A kw Cambridge Team', '**All Apartments Subject to Current Availability and Pricing.', 'Prices and Availability are subject to Change.', 'Pictures in the Advertising May NOT be of the actual unit but will represent the unit in its likeness.', 'A Keller Williams Realty Cambridge Team']
